TopicTitle: New Install... "Update" and "Play" are greyed out

Articles.Content:
Finally got the game downloaded after many failed attempts over the last few days (it's been really slow with .25 coming out I guess).

Thought I was going to get to play, but it opens and the "Play" button is grey, so I click "Update," and then it goes grey. No indication of what is happening, no spinner or notification. It's been like that for hours. I tried exiting and restarting once, but it just did the same thing. What's happening? Is it installing an update? (I thought I would have downloaded the most up to date version...)
Work around, try running the KSP exe directly, rather than the launcher?

Work around, try running the KSP exe directly, rather than the launcher?

Ah that worked. What is the Launcher anyway? Doesn't seem to be of much use.
